title: Quarterly average daily rate of hotels in Barcelona 2010 to 2017
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 4 different Quarters on X-axis for 8 groups 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Average daily rate in euros.
All through the Quarters, the Average daily rate in euros for 2010 have lowered. On the other hand, for Quarter the Average daily rate in euros have risen.
Quarter Q3 had the maximum Average daily rate in euros among all 8 groups, and it was for 2015. The minimum Average daily rate in euros was observed in Quarter Q4 for 2017.
There is a gap of 14.0 between the highest and lowest Average daily rate in euros found for 2010 in Quarter Q2 and Q1.

All through the Quarters, the Average daily rate in euros for 2010 have lowered. On the other hand, for Quarter the Average daily rate in euros have risen.

All through the Quarters, the Average daily rate in euros for 2010 have lowered. On the other hand, for Quarter the Average daily rate in euros have risen.
Quarter Q3 had the maximum Average daily rate in euros among all 8 groups, and it was for 2015. The minimum Average daily rate in euros was observed in Quarter Q4 for 2017.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 4 different Quarters on X-axis for 8 groups 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Average daily rate in euros.
All through the Quarters, the Average daily rate in euros for 2010 have lowered. On the other hand, for Quarter the Average daily rate in euros have risen.
Quarter Q3 had the maximum Average daily rate in euros among all 8 groups, and it was for 2015. The minimum Average daily rate in euros was observed in Quarter Q4 for 2017.
Among all the Quarters, 2010 had the highest Average daily rate in euros 130.0 in Quarter Q2 and lowest value 116.0 in Quarter Q1.
There is a gap of 14.0 between the highest and lowest Average daily rate in euros found for 2010 in Quarter Q2 and Q1.
Out of all 8 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Average daily rate in euros was found in case of 2011.
2015 had the maximum Average daily rate in euros out of all 8 groups in Quarter Q3 followed by 2015 in Q3, and the minimum Average daily rate in euros is found for 2017 in Q4.

On average, the Quarter Q1 had the highest Average daily rate in euros for all 8 groups 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017. Whereas Q4 had the lowest average Average daily rate in euros.
